communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: FCC Complaints for 2022 Superbowl
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All complaints related to the most recent NFL Superbowl aired in February 2023.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Gabriel Garcia

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: FBI use of Discord
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Copies of all records, documents, and materials held by the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) concerning the use, monitoring, or investigation of the messaging platform Discord from January 1, 2015, to the present day.

The requested information should include, but not be limited to:

1. Any FBI investigative files, reports, memos, or correspondence involving the use of Discord by individuals or groups for criminal activities, including but not limited to cybercrime, terrorism, or hate crimes;
2. Any records of communication or cooperation between the FBI and Discord (the company), or any other law enforcement or intelligence agencies, foreign or domestic, in relation to the use, monitoring, or investigation of activities on the Discord platform;
3. Any guidelines, policies, or procedures established by the FBI for monitoring or investigating communications on Discord, and any training materials provided to FBI personnel concerning the use of Discord for investigative purposes;
4. Any records of complaints, inquiries, or reports submitted to the FBI regarding activities on Discord or the use of Discord by individuals or groups for criminal activities.

Please search not only for main file records (this is the FBI’s default search) but also for “cross-reference” records in the FBI's Central Records System, Electronic Surveillance (ELSUR) records, and any other appropriate records systems for the requested information.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Gabriel Garcia
